description: React component source code for the System Explorer interface, including tabs for risk summary, dependency map, and evaluations, with data fetching and UI rendering logic.

methods.name: RiskTab
methods.description: Component displaying risk summary data for a system.

methods.name: DependencyTab
methods.description: Component displaying dependency map data for a system.

methods.name: EvaluationsTab
methods.description: Component displaying evaluation history for a system.

methods.name: SystemDetail
methods.description: Component showing detailed info and tabs for a selected system.

methods.name: SystemExplorer
methods.description: Main component rendering system list and detail panel.
